author: Roland
content:
And you just felt you HAVE to rub that on my nose by showing that extreme closeup! Seriously, I love autumn and I'm quite happy the fogs will appear soon, the leaves awake from the dull, fat green phase, the trees start again moving thanks to the winds... but here, I truly felt like I will hear a *thump* and feel a bump any fraction of a second for the apple really seems to be swinging towards my forehead

cheers
